member.summary: Adds a probe for Azure Service Bus Message Bus.
member.param: The service name. If null, the default service will be probed.

member.param: The name of the queue that should be diagnosed.
The service name. If null, the default service will be probed.
The health probe name. If not specified will be used.
member.remarks: This diagnostic executes an operation on to retrieve the specified queue runtime properties.

member.summary: Adds a diagnostic for the specified Azure Service Bus Message Bus topic.
